import { DashboardService } from './../../dashboard.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-top-bar', templateUrl: './top-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./top-bar.component.scss'] }) export class TopBarComponent implements OnInit { type$? : Observable = this.dashboardService.type$; constructor(private dashboardService: DashboardService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
